title: Worked Solution
text:
The correct answer is: "You need to understand data in order to present it effectively."

Explanation:
Presenting data effectively requires a deep understanding of what the data represents, including its context, limitations, and insights. Data literacy enables presenters to interpret, analyze, and communicate the information accurately and persuasively, ensuring the audience grasps the key points without misunderstanding or confusion. While knowing statistics and data fluency may help, the key point here is being able to effectively present the data.
